pow_le_choose:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `nat.factorial -/
-- horrific casting is due to ℕ-subtraction
theorem pow_le_choose (r n : ℕ) : ((n + 1 - r : ℕ) ^ r : α) / nat.factorial r ≤ n.choose r :=
  by
  rw [div_le_iff']
  · norm_cast
    rw [← Nat.descFactorial_eq_factorial_mul_choose]
    exact n.pow_sub_le_desc_factorial r
  exact_mod_cast r.factorial_pos
#align pow_le_choose pow_le_choose
choose_le_pow:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `nat.factorial -/
/-
Copyright (c) 2021 Yaël Dillies. All rights reserved.
Released under Apache 2.0 license as described in the file LICENSE.
Authors: Yaël Dillies, Eric Rodriguez
-/
theorem choose_le_pow (r n : ℕ) : (n.choose r : α) ≤ n ^ r / nat.factorial r :=
  by
  rw [le_div_iff']
  · norm_cast
    rw [← Nat.descFactorial_eq_factorial_mul_choose]
    exact n.desc_factorial_le_pow r
  exact_mod_cast r.factorial_pos
#align choose_le_pow choose_le_pow
